title: "called mid, ima go mid idgaf"
body: rito plz. every ranked game is like this. ppl dont get their roles and just turn into teeemos..... just cus they had a taste of the new ranked pick shit....seriously ppl go away

replies.body:
Dynamic queue giveth
Dynamic queue taketh away
Queue with 4 friends, never have this issue again.
what is this " friends " u speak of. i know of no such things
